function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Indoor air-temperature and relative humidity within a range favorable for microbial growth.","Impact":"Risk of microbial growth and propagation of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement air filtration and ventilation systems to reduce microbial growth and spread.","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C germicidal lamps, high-efficiency ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with weak immune systems.","Owner":"Building management, HVAC maintenance personnel."}]}
